title: Ticket #2272: Need command-line tool condor_checkpoint_job
description: The condor_checkpoint command needs a companion condor_checkpoint_job, similar to condor_vacate_job. Condor_checkpoint connects to a startd and tells it to checkpoint one of its running jobs. In a pool with strong security enabled, a user will typically not have the necessary authorization to issue this command (the startd will reject it). Condor_checkpoint_job would connect to the schedd and tell it to checkpoint one or more of the user's running jobs.
